review: Met Dr Awasthi about a. year ago about my humerus already operated twice and plate fixed.  A wonderful listener and patient caring doctor whose advice leaves a soothing on the patients. May he live long, stay healthy  and treat the patients!

review: He is a patient listener and explains the problem/treatment meticulously.It was my first visit, felt comfortable and satisfied with the treatment.
** ** ***** ************* *** have great passion for his profession . Deals with lot of patience . He is young and creates positive vibes
Doctor is not available during said timing at Tarak hospital. Hospital personnel at counter is asking Patient to search doctor on OT. Very rude and unprofessional behaviour.
Doctor is very friendly * ************* ** *** ******Clinic is also well equipped. Doctor is taking himself X rays.

Would definitely recommend the doctor to my near and dear ones. Doctor was honest and confident and explained everything to us in clear words. We were very satisfied by the way he treated my old mother.
